title: Diet Plan Calculator - Calculate Your Daily Calorie Needs

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) + 5
formulas.raw: BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) + 5

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) - 161
formulas.raw: BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) - 161

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \text{Goal Calories} = TDEE + \text{Goal Modifier (e.g., -500 for weight loss)}
formulas.raw: \text{Goal Calories} = TDEE + \text{Goal Modifier (e.g., -500 for weight loss)}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For Men: $$BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) + 5$$ For Women: $$BMR = (10 \times \text{weight in kg}) + (6.25 \times \text{height in cm}) - (5 \times \text{age in years}) - 161$$

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $$\text{Goal Calories} = TDEE + \text{Goal Modifier (e.g., -500 for weight loss)}$$
